attributes.action: introduce a firework tax and ban bonfires to save the planet
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: do really we need fireworks or bonfires, if this threat to the polar icecaps and gobal warming is real then lets cut back on cheap fireworks i thought the whole idea is to save the planet, anyway if guy fawkes had have succeeded in blowing up the houses of parliament, maybe are country wouldn be in such a poor state as it is now
